articles.title: Okta Hack Blamed on Employee Using Personal Google Account on Company Laptop - SecurityWeek
articles.description: Okta is blaming the recent hack of its support system on an employee who logged into a personal Google account on a company-managed laptop.
articles.content: Okta is blaming the recent hack of its support system on an employee who logged into a personal Google account on a company-managed laptop, exposing credentials that led to the theft of data from mul… [+3350 chars]
